thread.title: Dads, We Need To Have A Come-To-Jesus Moment
thread.title_full: Dads, We Need To Have A Come-To-Jesus Moment

author: Mike Spohr Buzzfeed Staff
title: Dads, We Need To Have A Come-To-Jesus Moment
text: Shout-out to the timid dad on the left. My kind of guy. ID: 10569731 10. Is it a machismo thing? If so, I am happy to be the fraidy cat, wimpy dad waving safely from the bench. graysonmacnab / Via instagram.com ID: 10570641 11. Look, dads, here is my argument in a nutshell: You know damn well you’ve dropped something in your life. youtube.com One of my kid-tossing buddies from college once dropped a beer he was already holding. He was literally just standing there — holding a beer — when it slipped from his hands. AND YET HE TRUSTS HIMSELF TO THROW HIS KIDS IN THE AIR! ID: 10554130 12. Look at this kid wearing a GoPro — she’s coming in fast and furious! Dads, you are not Ozzie Smith. You aren’t going to catch everything. youtube.com ID: 10570323 13. Odds are you will eventually drop your kid, and when that happens no one is going to be like, “It’s cool, dad! You caught her the previous 967 times! This trip to the emergency room is TOTALLY forgotten!” Loading Instagram: @hellomynameisking ID: 10569831 14. Nope, drop that kid once and you’ll be left thinking, “What was I ever thinking?” You will also be left sleeping on the couch.
